meanings.definition: Put forward (an idea or plan) for consideration.
meanings.sent1: She proposes a new game for us to play.
meanings.sent2: He proposes a solution to the problem at hand.
meanings.sent3: The cat proposes a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The artist proposes a bold color scheme for the painting.
meanings.sent5: The teacher proposes a fun project for the class.

meanings.sent1: They propose to visit the zoo this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She proposes to start a new business next year.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel proposes to gather all the acorns in the park.
meanings.sent4: The chef proposes to create a unique dish for the menu.
meanings.sent5: He proposes to learn a new language by the end of the year.
